name: Sky Whale
text: If a Fish, Sea Serpent, or Aqua-type monster you control is banished: You can Special Summon this card from your GY (if it was there when it was banished) or hand (even if not). You can only Summon "Sky Whale" once per turn this way. Once per turn, you can banish 1 Fish, Sea Serpent, or Aqua-type monster from your hand, field, or GY, then target 1 monster you control; that monster can attack twice this turn.
